title: How the Cost Estimator works
body: This tool gives a fast, ballpark estimate based on your selections. It's not a quote. Final pricing depends on menu choices, staffing, rentals, and seasonality.

title: What affects event pricing most?
body: Guest count, service style (drop-off vs plated), and the level of culinary experience (premium vs budget-friendly) have the biggest impact on cost.

title: Is setup and cleanup included?
body: Yes, our all-inclusive estimates include prep, on-site service, and cleanup where applicable. Rentals and specialty items may be additional.

title: Pizza party pricing
body: Pizza parties include a base for up to ~15 guests and scale per person beyond that. Add-ons like salads or desserts can be included upon request.
